content.chorus:
O Chineke gbaghara mee ebere Nna Onyenweanyi doo,
njo nile m mere Chineke moo gbaghara
content.refrain:
Onye oma ee Onyeoma
Onye oma ee Onyeoma
verses:
Ike agwugo moo n'ajo omume
M wee yoba Chineke Nna Onyeoma

Njo egbugo moo Nna n'ezie
Ana m ayozi Chineke Nna Onyeoma

Mkpuru obi moo n'achosi Gi ike
E-ewo Chineke Nna Onyeoma

Chukwu Nna Onye obioma
Cheta nkwa Gi Onye kere uwa Nna gbaghara

Afoma Gi Chineke bara uba
Ana m atukwasi obi na-ebere Onyeoma
